DOC.brief_summary: In the present study, we evaluated whether RIPC with RIPostC reduce the major neurocomplication in patients undergoing STA-MCA anastomosis.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Remote Ischemic Preconditioning With Postconditioning on Neurologic Outcome
DOC.criteria: 1. American Society of Anesthesiologists 2. Adults 18 to 65 years of age 3. In patients with planned MCASTA anastomosis under general anesthesia 4. Patients who preagreed to the study 1. If there is a history of peripheral vascular arterial or venous disease 2. If there is a previous history of peripheral nerve disease 3. Other brain or cerebrovascular disease 4. In case of serious cardiovascular disease, pulmonary disease, kidney disease 5. Patients who do not agree with the test
